curator_overview: Essential services around World Equestrian Center – Ocala so you can knock out errands between trips to the warm-up and the jog strip. Everything here is close, easy to park a rig or SUV, and reliable during peak show weeks.
curator_cta_text: Book deliveries and rentals early — Ocala fills fast during Winter Spectacular and major weeks.

grocery.description: Closest, no-drama grocery stops with dependable delivery/pickup so you’re not burning ring time.

spots.name: Publix Super Market (NW Ocala corridor)
spots.notes: Most barns use Instacart here. Reliable same-day windows; easy in/out parking for SUVs.

spots.name: Walmart Supercenter (SR-40/US-27 access)
spots.notes: Budget bulk runs — ice, coolers, drinks. Mobile pickup is quick before first class.

spots.name: Target (College Rd corridor)
spots.notes: Good for rider basics and grab-and-go food; consistent curbside pickup.

pharmacy.description: Pharmacies with extended hours and drive-thru for late barn nights.

spots.name: CVS Pharmacy (multiple Ocala locations)
spots.notes: Dependable drive-thru; quick OTC runs between schooling and jog.

spots.name: Walgreens (US-27/SR-40 corridor)
spots.notes: Fast photo/print for numbers and paperwork; good late-evening hours.

feed_tack_bedding.description: Equestrian supply outlets that understand show-week urgency and deliver to stabling.

spots.name: Tack Shack of Ocala
spots.notes: Ocala staple — tack, blankets, repairs, nameplates; barn delivery available in season.

spots.name: Seminole Feed
spots.notes: Premium feeds and shavings; ask for stall-side drop schedules during big weeks.

spots.name: Ocala Breeders’ Feed & Supply
spots.notes: Feeds, bedding, barn supplies; accustomed to high-volume show orders.

car_rental.description: Agencies with quick pickup so trainers and grooms aren’t stranded.

spots.name: Enterprise Rent-A-Car (Ocala/College Rd corridor)
spots.notes: Week-long SUV availability is strong; ask about first-hour pickup.

spots.name: Hertz at Ocala International Airport (OCF)
spots.notes: Easiest handoff for owners/family flying in; short hop to the showgrounds.

golf_cart_rental.description: Cart options riders actually use around stabling and housing. Reserve ahead for peak weeks.

spots.name: On-site Golf Cart Rentals (via WEC Ocala / Show Office)
spots.notes: Check with the Show Office or Vendor Row for current rental partners; limited same-week availability.

spots.name: Dever Inc. – Golf Cart Rentals
spots.notes: Equestrian-specific rentals and service trucks; ask for multi-week packages and paddock support.
